Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value:
This Workflow integrates Shopify with Sage Intacct.
It retrieves a list of transactions from Shopify, separates each payment into individual records, and checks whether they have already been processed against a Key Value. 
For each transaction, it fetches the associated Shopify order items and Sage Intacct customer details.
If the customer does not exist in Sage Intacct, the Workflow creates the customer record.
Finally, it maps the data and creates a Payment in Sage Intacct, logging either a success or error for each processed order.

Nodes.Name: VariableBar
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are setting the Key Value Group

Nodes.Name: Formatter
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are displaying a message if the Payment ID has been found in the Key Value Group

Nodes.Name: SetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here we are logging the Key Value record for successful records.
We get the Group from the Variable bar.
We use the Payment ID as the Key (Notice the fx on the input - you need to select which field in the payload is the Key.)
We use the Sage RecordNO Key as the Value.

Nodes.Name: ShopifyRest
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are retrieving a list of Payments

Nodes.Name: GetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we check to see if the Payment ID has been processed before by checking if a Key Value record has already been logged for this Payment ID.

Nodes.Name: ShopifyRest
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are getting the order from Shopify based on the OrderID from the specific Payment

Properties.Name: Response

Nodes.Name: SageIntacct
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are looking up the Customer in Sage based on the Customer ID from the Shopify Order

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="object" type="xs:string"/>
        <xs:element name="keys" type="xs:string"/>
        <xs:element name="fields" type="xs:string"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>
Properties.Name: Request

Nodes.Name: IfVisualBasic
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here we are checking if the Customer exists by validating that the value of the CustomerID is not null
If Exists: create the Payment in Sage
If Not: Create the Customer in Sage and the Create the Invoice.

Nodes.Name: QuickMap
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we map the Payment items retrieved from Shopify to the Sage Intacct format before creating the Payment in Sage

              <xs:element name="DOCNUMBER" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="RECEIPTDATE" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="PAYMENTDATE" type="xs:string"/>

                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>","targetSchemaType":1}

Nodes.Name: SageIntacct
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are creating the Payment in Sage

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="ARPYMT">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="FINANCIALENTITY" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="PAYMENTMETHOD" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="CUSTOMERID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="DOCNUMBER" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="RECEIPTDATE" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="PAYMENTDATE" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="ARPYMTDETAILS">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="ARPYMTDETAIL">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="RECORDKEY" type="xs:unsignedByte"/>
                          <xs:element name="TRX_PAYMENTAMOUNT" type="xs:unsignedByte"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>
Properties.Name: Request

Nodes.Name: IfVisualBasic
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are checking if the Payment was successfully created by validating the Response to check if the it contains a RecordNo

Nodes.Name: SetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here we are logging the Key Value record for error records.
We get the Group from the Variable bar.
We use the Payment ID as the Key (Notice the fx on the input - you need to select which field in the payload is the Key.)
We use the Sage Response Status as the Value.

Nodes.Name: QuickMap
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we map the Customer data retrieved from the Shopify Order to the Sage Intacct format before creating the Customer record in Sage.

Nodes.Name: SageIntacct
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are creating the Customer record in Sage

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="CUSTOMER">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="CUSTOMERID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="NAME" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="DISPLAYCONTACT">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="PRINTAS" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="COMPANYNAME" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="TAXABLE" type="xs:boolean" />
                    <xs:element name="TAXGROUP" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="PREFIX" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="FIRSTNAME" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="LASTNAME" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="INITIAL" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="PHONE1" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                    <xs:element name="PHONE2" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                    <xs:element name="CELLPHONE" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                    <xs:element name="PAGER" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                    <xs:element name="FAX" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                    <xs:element name="EMAIL1" />
                    <xs:element name="EMAIL2" />
                    <xs:element name="URL1" />
                    <xs:element name="URL2" />
                    <xs:element name="MAILADDRESS">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="ADDRESS1" type="xs:string" />
                          <xs:element name="ADDRESS2" type="xs:string" />
                          <xs:element name="CITY" type="xs:string" />
                          <xs:element name="STATE" type="xs:string" />
                          <xs:element name="ZIP" type="xs:unsignedInt" />
                          <xs:element name="COUNTRY" type="xs:string" />
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ONETIME" type="xs:boolean" />
              <xs:element name="STATUS" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="HIDEDISPLAYCONTACT" type="xs:boolean" />
              <xs:element name="CUSTTYPE" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="PARENTID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="GLGROUP" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="TERRITORYID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="SUPDOCID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="TERMNAME" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="OFFSETGLACCOUNTNO" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
              <xs:element name="ARACCOUNT" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
              <xs:element name="SHIPPINGMETHOD" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="RESALENO" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
              <xs:element name="TAXID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="CREDITLIMIT" type="xs:decimal" />
              <xs:element name="ONHOLD" type="xs:boolean" />
              <xs:element name="DELIVERY_OPTIONS" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="CUSTMESSAGEID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="COMMENTS" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="CURRENCY" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ARINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="OEQUOTEPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="OEORDERPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="OELISTPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="OEINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="OEADJPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="OEOTHERPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string" />

                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="CONTACTNAME" type="xs:string" />

                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="BILLTO">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="CONTACTNAME" type="xs:string" />
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>

Properties.Name: Request
Properties.Value:
<Request>
  <CUSTOMER>
    <CUSTOMERID>C1234</CUSTOMERID>
    <NAME>SaaS Company Inc</NAME>
    <DISPLAYCONTACT>
      <PRINTAS>SaaS Company Inc</PRINTAS>
      <COMPANYNAME>SaaS Co</COMPANYNAME>
      <TAXABLE>true</TAXABLE>
      <TAXGROUP>CA</TAXGROUP>
      <PREFIX>Mr</PREFIX>
      <FIRSTNAME>Bill</FIRSTNAME>
      <LASTNAME>Smith</LASTNAME>
      <INITIAL>G</INITIAL>
      <PHONE1>12</PHONE1>
      <PHONE2>34</PHONE2>
      <CELLPHONE>56</CELLPHONE>
      <PAGER>78</PAGER>
      <FAX>90</FAX>
      <EMAIL1 />
      <EMAIL2 />
      <URL1 />
      <URL2 />
      <MAILADDRESS>
        <ADDRESS1>300 Park Ave</ADDRESS1>
        <ADDRESS2>Ste 1400</ADDRESS2>
        <CITY>San Jose</CITY>
        <STATE>CA</STATE>
        <ZIP>95110</ZIP>
        <COUNTRY>United States</COUNTRY>
      </MAILADDRESS>
    </DISPLAYCONTACT>
    <ONETIME>false</ONETIME>
    <STATUS>active</STATUS>
    <HIDEDISPLAYCONTACT>false</HIDEDISPLAYCONTACT>
    <CUSTTYPE>SaaS</CUSTTYPE>
    <PARENTID>C5678</PARENTID>
    <GLGROUP>Group</GLGROUP>
    <TERRITORYID>NE</TERRITORYID>
    <SUPDOCID>A1234</SUPDOCID>
    <TERMNAME>N30</TERMNAME>
    <OFFSETGLACCOUNTNO>1200</OFFSETGLACCOUNTNO>
    <ARACCOUNT>4000</ARACCOUNT>
    <SHIPPINGMETHOD>USPS</SHIPPINGMETHOD>
    <RESALENO>123</RESALENO>
    <TAXID>12-3456789</TAXID>
    <CREDITLIMIT>1234.56</CREDITLIMIT>
    <ONHOLD>false</ONHOLD>
    <DELIVERY_OPTIONS>Print</DELIVERY_OPTIONS>
    <CUSTMESSAGEID>hello</CUSTMESSAGEID>
    <COMMENTS>my comment</COMMENTS>
    <CURRENCY>USD</CURRENCY>
    <ARINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID>temp1</ARINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID>
    <OEQUOTEPRINTTEMPLATEID>temp2</OEQUOTEPRINTTEMPLATEID>
    <OEORDERPRINTTEMPLATEID>temp3</OEORDERPRINTTEMPLATEID>
    <OELISTPRINTTEMPLATEID>temp4</OELISTPRINTTEMPLATEID>
    <OEINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID>temp5</OEINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID>
    <OEADJPRINTTEMPLATEID>temp6</OEADJPRINTTEMPLATEID>
    <OEOTHERPRINTTEMPLATEID>temp7</OEOTHERPRINTTEMPLATEID>
    <CONTACTINFO>
      <CONTACTNAME>primary</CONTACTNAME>
    </CONTACTINFO>
    <BILLTO>
      <CONTACTNAME>bill to</CONTACTNAME>
    </BILLTO>
    <SHIPTO>
      <CONTACTNAME>ship to</CONTACTNAME>
    </SHIPTO>
    <OBJECTRESTRICTION>Restricted</OBJECTRESTRICTION>
    <RESTRICTEDLOCATIONS>100#~#200</RESTRICTEDLOCATIONS>
    <RESTRICTEDDEPARTMENTS>D100#~#D200</RESTRICTEDDEPARTMENTS>
    <CUSTOMFIELD1>Hello</CUSTOMFIELD1>
  </CUSTOMER>
  <CUSTOMER>
    <CUSTOMERID>C1234</CUSTOMERID>
    <NAME>SaaS Company Inc</NAME>
    <DISPLAYCONTACT>
      <PRINTAS>SaaS Company Inc</PRINTAS>
      <COMPANYNAME>SaaS Co</COMPANYNAME>
      <TAXABLE>true</TAXABLE>
      <TAXGROUP>CA</TAXGROUP>
      <PREFIX>Mr</PREFIX>

      <URL2 />
      <MAILADDRESS>
        <ADDRESS1>300 Park Ave</ADDRESS1>

        <CITY>San Jose</CITY>
        <STATE>CA</STATE>
        <ZIP>95110</ZIP>
        <COUNTRY>United States</COUNTRY>
      </MAILADDRESS>
    </DISPLAYCONTACT>
    <ONETIME>false</ONETIME>
    <STATUS>active</STATUS>
    <HIDEDISPLAYCONTACT>false</HIDEDISPLAYCONTACT>
    <CUSTTYPE>SaaS</CUSTTYPE>
    <PARENTID>C5678</PARENTID>
    <GLGROUP>Group</GLGROUP>
    <TERRITORYID>NE</TERRITORYID>
    <SUPDOCID>A1234</SUPDOCID>
    <TERMNAME>N30</TERMNAME>
    <OFFSETGLACCOUNTNO>1200</OFFSETGLACCOUNTNO>
    <ARACCOUNT>4000</ARACCOUNT>

    <ONHOLD>false</ONHOLD>
    <DELIVERY_OPTIONS>Print</DELIVERY_OPTIONS>
    <CUSTMESSAGEID>hello</CUSTMESSAGEID>
    <COMMENTS>my comment</COMMENTS>
    <CURRENCY>USD</CURRENCY>
    <ARINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID>temp1</ARINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID>

Nodes.Name: IfEqual
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are verifying that the Customer was successfully created before proceeding to creating the Payment record in Sage

Name: Shopify To Sage Intacct Payments
Description: This Workflow integrates Shopify with Sage Intacct by processing transactions, retrieving order items and customer details, and checking against a Key-Value store. It creates missing customers and posts payments to Sage Intacct, logging the result for each.
